name: Day of the Feet
description: In an unknown footure, you must stand toe to toe against The Interdimensional Feeteration, an organization of sentient, celestial, severed feet who wants to use Earth as a stepping stone for Universal  Domination. It's up to you, a humble bazooka owner, to go one step beyond and wear them out in a stylish endless battle royale. Our second project on Unity :)
